title: Runes missing
body:
So I went to play a game and tried to change my runes when I noticed all my rune pages were missing and have just reset to the presets. Where have all my rune pages gone? I tried looking at other forums and didn't see any responses, so I thought I would try here. 
I have already tried 'Initiate Full Repair' in General Settings, but that hasn't done anything.
